titles.title: To provide for supplemental appropriations for obesity programs of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

term.name: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 7/18/2012--Introduced. Makes: (1) emergency supplemental appropriations for obesity programs of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), and (2) offsetting rescissions of prior year unobligated balances of specified accounts.
